Articles.Content:
So, what country will lead us into the solar system?

The U.S.A.?

I doubt it, we were religated to pizza delivery and trash hauling for the ISS and can't even get there now.

Russia?

Naw, they're stuck in a high speed low wobble orbit around this planet sucking recycled pizz and reconstituted caviar since the STS doesn't fly.

China?

Possible, IF you want to wait another 100 years for them to decide it's profitable.

Private industry?

Not going to happen, do you really see Branson doing a mission without first class accomidations?

I have no idea at this point, maybe aliens contacted us and said to stay home or get whooped, it seems all we do is one step backwards anymore.

My country will lead. I call it Antarctica. It will be able to withstand all forms of reentry burn* which makes it better.

* Until the ice melts. There is a money back guarantee if this doesn't happen before you click launch.

It will however require a few boosters... Hey CarolRawley, can I borrow a peta-tonne of your trademarked substance to get my country ('s remnants) into space?

Sure. That will be...

ONE MILLION BILLION TRILLION DOLLARS!

MUA HA HA!

it will probably blow up your Ant-arc-t-ika, though.

Is that how you pronounce it?

it will probably blow up your Ant-arc-t-ika, though.

Is that how you pronounce it?

I normally just shorten it to 'place of explosions'. Even though that's longer...
